fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At any time, day, night or whenever, you may switch between being in flight or being grounded. You may choose to automatically change which state you are in at the end of a phase (such as a day or night).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you fly during the day, everyone will see and be informed you have wings. They will all know when you are flying and when you are grounded, but only during the day.
- You cannot be reached during the day while flying, this renders you immune to lynching and day abilities.
- When flying at night, all visits on you fail.
- If you are in flight at the end of two nights in a row, you must rest from flying the next night and cannot choose to fly.
- If you are in flight at the end of two days in a row, you must rest from flying the next day and cannot choose to fly.
